articles.title: Small firms see impact as flow of oxygen hit - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Over half a dozen companies, including Tata Steel Ltd, Reliance Industries Ltd, JSW Steel Ltd and SAIL Ltd, are pumping thousands of tonnes of medical-grade oxygen as India grapples with the worst surge in coronavirus infections.
articles.content:
The move to divert oxygen supplies from industry to hospitals across the country could impact the operations of hundreds of small and mid-sized companies, company executives warned.
